channel.title: Need help IMMEDIATLY! Please
channel.description:
Well, I have a question.
I am trying to make my own server.. I read over 4 different guides. And STILL can't get it to work. I follow the guides step by step but nothing happens when i go to log in. Well, it says: "Error Connecting to server". What do I have to do to the runserver.bat file? What do I have to do with the compile file thing? Can someone give me a little guide, not the whole process but, well, ok heres more detail! (lol).
I download Java JDK 6.
I download No-Ip.
I host my own IP thing, witch is: runescape-v3.no-ip.biz.
I add the name: runescape-v3 and port number: 43954 to the windows firewall thingy.
I have WinRAR.
I download TestScape.
I download Moparscape.
I do the "enviorment variables" thing.
I click on, runserver.bat but this scren comes up: Sometimes it says, 'java' is not reconized blah blah blah or something like that and sometimes, i click on it and it comes up real fast then dissapears.
I try to log in on Moparscapes downloaded client. Also, try to log in on Silab client. Nothing happens. Just, "Error Connecting To Server."
Can someone help??
Thank you :[)
